Name: Elvirleyderson
description:
Elvirleyderson is a senior farmer from Piendamo, Cauca, with 21 years of experience. He manages a one-hectare plot where he has a wide variety of flowers growing, meticulously caring for each species to ensure its health and natural beauty. Elvirleyderson diligently applies pesticides obtained from an agricultural store to protect his crops.

Elvirleyderson lives with his parents and siblings near his fields, receiving strong support from his family in caring for his crops.

A loan of $3,632,818 COP is helping Elvirleyderson purchase organic fungicides rich in pesticides that will optimize protection against fungal diseases and pests, ensuring healthier yields.
